snippet: By voting for François Hollande, French citizens delivered a rebuke to the idea that economic austerity is the solution to Europe’s financial crisis.
abstract: Editorial argues that the chief reason for Nicolas Sarkozy's failure to retain the French presidency was his support for counterproductive austerity policies; welcomes incoming Pres Francois Hollande, who has pledged to push France down a more growth-oriented path.
lead_paragraph: By voting for François Hollande, French citizens delivered a rebuke to the idea that economic austerity is the solution to Europe’s financial crisis.
